20775.「ガハハハハッ。よう 魔法戦士団。\n 例の魔物の件だが 朗報だぞ。:
Gahahahahaha. Hey, Armamentalist Corps. I have
good news about that monster.

20777.「タップペンギーを 棲息地から\n 遠く はなれた場所で目撃し 後をつけて\n:
We saw Pogoin' Penguin in a place far from its
habitat and followed it to a cave where they
congregated.

20778.「そこは 彼らが暮らすには\n まったく 適していない場所です。\n 自然に そ:
It is a completely unsuitable place for them
to live. There is no way they would naturally
move there.

20779.「……ということだ。どう見る？ 魔法戦士団。:
...that's what I mean. How do you see it?
Armamentalist.

20780.「魔物を動かした なんらかの要因があると\n 言いたいのか ザイナー？:
Are you suggesting that there's some kind of
factor that moved the monster, Zeiner?

20781.「かもしれん。本格的に調査を始めたい。\n たまには 魔法戦士団も\n オレらの:
Maybe. I'd like to start a full-scale
investigation. Maybe the Armamentalist Corps
would like to join us for a change.

20782.「ここは <pc>を行かせましょう。\n 適任かと 思われます。:
Let's let <pc> go here. It seems to
be the right choice.

20783.「……お前らに 手伝う気があるなら\n ジュレリア地下廃坑の 水環の間へ来い。\:
...If you are willing to help, come to the
Circle of Water in the Juleria Underground
Mine. Noran will go with you from the Guard.

20784.「誰も来なくても 調査は 開始するからな。\n 言いたいことは以上だ。失礼するぞ:
We'll start the investigation even if no one
shows up. That's all I have to say. Excuse me!

20785.「<pc>。話は聞いていたな？\n この報告 気になるのは 確かだ。\n 貴公に:
<pc>. You've heard the stories,
haven't you? I'm sure you're anxious to hear
this report. I'll have you go on a mission.

20786.「タップペンギーの 異常行動の\n 原因を 突きとめてくるのだ。\n これは調査:
You are to determine the cause of Pogoin'
Penguin's erratic behavior. This is an
investigative mission. Will you do it?

20787.「今回の任務は 私も同行しよう。\n なんらかの 手がかりが得られたら\n すぐ:
I will accompany you on this mission. As soon
as we get any clues, we must decide what to do
next.

20788.「ジュレー島の ジュレリア地下廃坑へ潜入。\n 水環の間を見つけだし 調査を開始:
Sneak into the Juleria Underground Mine on
Jule Island. Find the Circle of Water and
begin your investigation.

20789.「む……。どうやら 貴公は\n 多くの任務を 抱えているようだな。:
It seems that you have a lot of duties to
perform.

20790.「魔法戦士は ひとつの任務に\n 集中できる状態を 保たねばならない。\n 他の:
The armamentalist must remain focused on one
mission. Go and fulfill your other duties.

20791.「……それは 困ったな。\n 他の魔法戦士は 他国へ出払っていて\n 頼める者が:
Well, that's a problem. The other
armamentalists are away in other countries and
there is no one I can ask.

20792.「……まだ そんなこと言ってるの？: Are you still talking like that?

20794.「……いいかげん 魔法戦士になる決心を\n つけたら どうなの？:
Why don't you make up your mind to become an
armamentalist?

20795.「何度も言ってるだろ。\n オレは 魔法戦士になる気はない。:
I've said it many times. I have no intention
of becoming an armamentalist.

20796.「小さいときの約束……。\n ふたりで 魔法戦士になろうって……\n 忘れたわけ:
You didn't forget our promise when we were
little that we would both become
armamentalists, did you?

20797.「その話は もうやめてくれ ユナティ。\n それよりも 調査任務を始めよう。\n:
Let's not talk about it anymore, Unaty.
Instead, let's get on with the research
mission. Pogoin' Penguin is in the back here.

20798.「遅かったな <pc>。\n ……貴公。今の話を 聞いていたか？<yesno><:
Too late <pc>. ...you. Did you hear
what I just said?<yesno><close>.

20799.「……まあいい。もし 何か\n 聞いたのならば 忘れることだ。:
Well, that's okay. If you heard something,
forget it.

20801.「貴様 何者だ？ ここで 何をしている！？: Who are you? What are you doing here?

20802.「へいっ らっしぇい！！\n ……って なんでぇ 客じゃねえみてーだな？:
Hey, there, guys! Why do you look like you're
not a customer?

20803.「私は ヴェリナード王立魔法戦士団\n 副団長のユナティである。:
I am Unaty, Sub Leader Unaty of the Royal
Armamentalist Corps of Verinard.

20804.「魔法戦士団……？ てめぇらかあ！\n うちの商品ナンバー３を 壊しまくってんの:
Armamentalist Corps...? You guys! You're the
ones destroying our number 3 product! You're
ruining our customer's reputation!

20805.「まさか……。この魔物たちを\n よその国に 売っているのか？:
Don't tell me... you are selling these
monsters to other countries?

20806.「おうよ。魔物を調教して 売りさばくのよ。\n わしゃあ ザルギスってモンだ。\:
Oh, yeah. We train monsters and sell them. I
am Zargis. Call me a monster trader!

20807.「しかしなあ……。この倉庫を見つけられちゃあ\n 商売上がったりだよなあ。\n:
But, you know... if they find this warehouse,
it's bad for business, isn't it? I'll just
have to let them die.

20808.「新商品のナンバー７を 試させてもらうぜ。\n 出荷準備も整って バリバリの売れ:
I'm going to try out the new Item Number 7.
It's ready to ship, and it's selling like
hotcakes. I hope you like it. Kihi...

20809.「わしゃあ 伝票を書かなきゃいかんから\n 先に 帰らせてもらうぜい。:
I have to fill out a form, so I'm going home
first.

20810.「あいつは 私が追います！\n ここを お願いしますっ。: I'll go after him! Here, please.

20811.「<cs_pchero>！ 貴公は 魔物の相手を頼む。\n 私は ノーランの援護:
<cs_pchero>! You deal with the monsters. I'm
going to cover Noran!

20813.「<cs_pchero> どこへ行っていた？\n この魔物たちの相手を 頼んだは:
<cs_pchero> Where have you been? I thought I
asked you to deal with these monsters.

20814.「ノーランが 魔物商人ザルギスを追っている。\n 私は その援護に行かなくてはな:
Noran is in pursuit of the monster trader
Zargis. I have to go cover for him. I'll leave
this to you!

20816.「よくやった <cs_pchero>。\n 魔物の群れは 討伐したようだな。:
Well done <cs_pchero>. Looks like you took
down a bunch of monsters.

20817.「だが すまない。\n 魔物商人ザルギスは 逃してしまったのだ。:
But I'm sorry. Zargis, the monster merchant,
had been missed.

20818.「衛士ノーラン！ なぜ 私が追いつくまで\n ザルギスを 足止めできなかったのだ:
Guard Noran! Why didn't you manage to stop
Zargis in his tracks before I caught up with
him!

20819.「申し訳ありません。追いつめはしたのですが\n ザルギスが 新たな魔物を呼びだし:
My apologies. I was able to catch up with him,
but Zargis called up a new monster, and I had
a hard time dealing with it.

20820.「……今から追っても 間に合うまい。\n この一連の事件が あの男のしわざだと\:
We'll never get to him in time, even if we start chasing him now. It's a good thing that we know that this series of incidents were
caused by that man.

20821.「待ってください。あの男は 逃げる際に\n 手がかりとなる言葉を 残していきまし:
Wait a minute. That man left a clue in his
escape.

20822.「ふむ……。ならば それを\n アーベルク団長の前で 報告してほしい。\n 我々:
Well... then, I would like you to report it in
front of Commander Aberuku. We need to take
immediate action.

20823.「……わかりました。\n 後ほど アーベルク団長に 報告に参ります。:
I will report back to Commander Aberg later. I
will report to Commander Aberuku later.

20824.「<cs_pchero> ご苦労だった。\n 残念な点はあったが 調査任務は終わ:
Thank you for your efforts. I am sorry for your disappointment, but your investigative mission is over. Return to
Verinard Castle and see me.

20825.「衛士ノーラン ジュレリア地下廃坑\n 水環の間の調査報告に 参りました。:
Guard Noran, I am here to report on the
investigation of the Circle of Water.

20826.「ご苦労。貴公は 魔物商人ザルギスが\n 逃げる際の言葉を 聞いたそうだな。\n:
Thank you. You heard the words of Zargis, the
monster trader, when he escaped. You must tell
us every word of it.

20827.「はい。ザルギスは なんらかの地下組織に\n 商品ナンバー７と呼ぶ ウェナ諸島の:
Yes, sir. It appears that Zargis has sold a large number of monsters from the Wena Islands, which he calls Item Number 7, to some
sort of underground organization.

20828.「オーグリード大陸での 取り引きの予定が近い。\n その準備に追われている……と:
He said that he was very close to a deal to do
business in Ogreed Continent. We are busy with
the preparations..." he said.

20829.「なるほど……。そのせいで\n うかつに 姿を見せたということか。:
I see... so that's why he carelessly showed
himself.

20830.「その魔物が 大挙して 暴れることがあれば\n 国際問題となるは 必至か。\n:
If these monsters were to run rampant, it would inevitably become an international problem. We must summon the armamentalist
warriors and take countermeasures.

20831.「それは この国を守るため……ですか？: Is it to protect this country?

20832.「この国を守るのは 衛士団の役目ではないか。\n 我々には 国外で起こる事件を\:
Isn't it the role of the Guard to protect this country? We have the important task of preventing incidents from happening outside
the country.

20833.「魔法戦士団は オーグリード大陸に飛び\n 取り引き現場を 押さえにいくのだ。:
Armamentalist Corps flew to Ogreed Continent
to seize the scene of the deal.

20834.「……失礼しました。\n 衛士団は ザルギスの行方を追います。:
...my apologies. The Guard will pursue
Zargis' whereabouts.

20835.「ノーランめ 相変わらずか。\n そういえば 貴公は ノーランのことを\n よく:
Noran, as usual. Come to think of it, you
don't know much about Noran, do you?

20836.「……かつて 魔法戦士団にとって\n 最大の任務と呼ばれる ひどい事件があった。:
There was once a terrible incident called the Armamentalist Corps' greatest mission. Monsters organized themselves and attacked
towns all over the world.

20837.「その時は このヴェリナードも標的となり\n あるひとつの町が 魔物に壊滅させら:
Verinard was the target, and one town was
destroyed by the monsters. It was Noran's
hometown.

20838.「やつの母は その事件で亡くなり……。\n 魔法戦士だった父は 任務で他の国にい:
His mother died in the incident and his father, an armamentalist, was in another country on a mission and unable to help his
family.

20839.「ノーランは 死なずに済んだが\n この出来事が あやつの\n 魔法戦士になる決:
Noran may have survived, but the incident has
soured his resolve to become an armamentalist.

20840.「<pc>。任務 ご苦労だった。\n 私は 他の魔法戦士に連絡を取り\n 取り引:
<pc>. Thank you for your service. I
will have to contact the other armamentalists
and work out a way to prevent a deal.

20841.「しばらく 時間がほしい。\n 貴公は さらに 優美たる魔法戦士を目指し\n 修:
I need some time. You must continue your
training to become a more graceful
armamentalist.
